Product List

For product list use .product class, and you can combine this with .column class for grid view.

Example 
        
        <!--list view-->
        // use comlum class for grid view
        <ul class="list-view product">
          <!--list item-->
          <li class="list-view-item">
            <!--image wrapper-->
            <div class="img-wrapper circle">
              <img src="...">
            </div>
            <!--content-->
            <div class="item-content">
              <!--link title-->
              <div class="item-title">
              <a href="">The title always is longer than this title.</a>
              </div>
              <!--price/credit/shipping info-->
              <div class="item-price">
                <p class="price">$ 999</p>
                <p class="credit"><i class="fa fa-credit-card text-primary" aria-hidden="true"></i> 12x $ 99</p>
              </div>
              <!--additional info-->
              <div class="item-info">
                <ul>
                  <li>Capital Federal</li>
                  <li>120 vendidos</li>
                </ul>
              </div>
            </div>
          </li>
          <!--/list item-->
        </ul>
        <!--/list view-->
